Requirements: Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. Requires iOS 4.3 or later. This app is optimized for iPhone 5.


Description

cPRO+ features an intuitive interface and essential set of features to browse and post to Craigslist. It also includes Search Agents that run your Craigslist searches in the background even after you exit cPRO+ and notify you of new matches.

"iPhone users have a secret weapon in CraigsPro+, which lets you search Craigslist much more easily than the Web site, and it offers a handful of other great features."
-- Bob Tedeschi, The NY Times

"CraigsPro+. The entire world of Craigslist in the palm of your hand, with all gazillion listings: antiques, real estate, job openings."
-- House Beautiful Magazine

"All of the features of Craigslist, but with a search agent option that notifies you of new results that match your terms."
-- Forbes.com

BROWSING:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ simultaneous MULTI-CITY searches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MAP BROWSER
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PHOTO GALLERY
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ GPS-based AUTO-LOCATION
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ search results with PHOTOS and listing previews
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ zoomable FULL-SCREEN PHOTOS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ all Craigslist cities, states, countries and continents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ enhanced 20+ SEARCH OPTIONS tailored to different search categories - for sale, housing, jobs, gigs, etc
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NEIGHBORHOOD support in metropolitan areas
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TIME SINCE POSTED indicators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ REFRESH results directly from the results view page
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Best of Craigslist!

POSTING:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 1,000,000 successfully posted ads with the use of the app!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ POST a Craigslist ad directly from CraigsPro+
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ post from MULTIPLE Craigslist ACCOUNTS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ take pictures with your CAMERA or use photos from your PHOTO ALBUMS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ full-fledged Craigslist ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT including REPOSTING with photos, editing, and deleting/undeleting posted ads

BOOKMARKS:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ save/bookmark FAVORITE Craigslist ads
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ add NOTES to your FAVORITE ads to keep track of your discussions with posters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ save FULLY-CONFIGURED searches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ EDIT saved searches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ a TRACKING SYSTEM for saved searches with new match indicators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ HISTORY of searches. REPEAT a search by tapping the 'bookmarks' button

COMMUNICATIONS:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ REPLY to posters by email
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ CALL posters directly from CraigsPro
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ EMAIL / TEXT a listing to a FRIEND
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ attach PHOTOS to replies
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ share Craigslist ads on TWITTER
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MAPS and DIRECTIONS to the posted location

EXTRAS:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PHOTO WALL with matching results listed as photos
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ALREADY SEEN listing indicators (green checkmarks)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TIME SINCE POSTED indicators
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ FLAG inappropriate and best-of-craigslist ads
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ save posted photos to your PHOTO ALBUMS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SORT results by date, best match, or low/high price
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ORIGINAL listing web page
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ results with DATE, LOCATION, and PRICE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PIN code lock protection

*********************

SEARCH AGENTS:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ fully configurable MULTI-CITY search agents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ register any of your searches as a SEARCH AGENT
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ search agents keep checking Craiglist until a new listing matching the search criteria is posted (even after you exit cPRO+)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ new match INDICATORS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ search agents NOTIFY you of new matches using SOUND alerts, vibration, and/or the number of new hits displayed on top of the app icon
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Register up to 15 Search Agents simultaneously searching in up to 10 cities each
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NEW: Unlimited notifications

*********************

cPRO+ results are always identical to Craigslist. You have the power of 20+ cPRO+ search options to narrow down the search to what you are interested in.

*********************

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
